name: Relit
description:
Our very first game and submission for the "My First Game Jam Summer 2020" with the theme "CHANGE"! 

We appreciate any feedback let us know in the comments below!

Summary:

You are the bridge between light and dark. But before saving the world can you escape dungeon split between the two dimensions?!

Use your powers to switch between light and dark forms to escape and fulfill your destiny!
